item.description:
Hello All!

Scott and I are considering going to this trade show in NYC. It's the biggest Photographic Trade show in the US. I've gone every year for the last 5 years and always find it fun and exciting. It is NYC! ... and the show lasts from Oct 18-Oct 20. I think we will be going down on the last Day. The 20th. Maybe we can car pool if folks are interested in going? I think 10.00 each should cover tolls and gas and parking if we get 4 folks to split it...Let me know your thoughts.

If you sign up on thier web site before 9/26 you can get into the expo for free. After that it is 40.00. So even if your not sure about going you should sign up now and be free!

Here is some info and a link to the event.

http://www.photopluse...

The most comprehensive event in the photography & imaging industries.

Be there as the ever-changing world of photography & imaging comes into focus at PDN PhotoPlus International Conference + Expo 2007 - the premier event for innovative imaging solutions, photographic education and unparalleled networking.

PDN PhotoPlus International Conference + Expo 2007 is your chance to:
Discover new imaging solutions: Preview the hottest products and technologies on the market from over 300 of the industrys leading manufacturers and suppliers.
Awaken your creativity: Learn the newest techniques and rules from the world?s greatest photographers and imaging experts at the PhotoPlus Conference.
Find visual inspiration: Get up-close and hands-on with the latest advances in digital, film and output; and rediscover your passions in the extraordinary photo galleries on the Expo floor.

Connect with creative minds: PDN PhotoPlus International brings the leaders, innovators and rising stars in our industry together at the hottest networking events.
Simply stated: PDN PhotoPlus International Conference + Expo has the products and education you need to be a leader in the photography and imaging industries?today and in the future. Whether you?re a professional or advanced amateur, you will discover a marketplace of solutions that is unrivaled worldwide.

Pricing
Expo Only
On or before September 26 - $10
Register online and expo only registration is FREE!

After September 26 - $40

Gold Expo Pass
On or before September 26 - $59
After September 26 - $79

Two Hour Seminars On or Before September 26 After September 26
1-2 Seminars $80 each $95 each
3-4 Seminars $70 each $85 each
5-7 Seminars $65 each $80 each
Full Seminar Package (8-9 Seminars) * $495 $495
*Does not include Hands-On or Three Hour Seminars

Three Hour Seminars On or Before September 26 After September 26
$105 each $120 each

Hands-On Labs On or Before September 26 After September 26
$150 each $170 each

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
